headline: Ellucian Awards Transact + CBORD Verified SaaS Badges for Eight Integrated Payment Solutions
summary: SCOTTSDALE, Ariz., August 05, 2025--Transact + CBORD has earned Ellucian’s "Verified for SaaS" badges for eight of its most widely adopted Integrated Payments solutions—making it easier for colleges using Ellucian Banner SaaS to adopt proven, secure payment solutions with confidence. The badges confirm that Transact + CBORD’s solutions are built to integrate smoothly with Ellucian’s cloud platform, reducing technical lift and helping schools modernize faster.
